CONTROL.TITLE: Quality Control
CONTROL.TEXT: The quality management system of LLC Georgia Metal operates in accordance with ISO 9001 and DIN 4882. The company’s quality control system is certified by a well-known and reputable organization. Our main goal is to ensure the highest quality product to meet the most demanding customers both locally and internationally. To ensure high product quality, we strictly control the quality of imported steel materials. Our quality control department consists of experienced specialists who constantly monitor all stages of the production process. Product testing is carried out in our laboratory, which is equipped with the latest devices manufactured according to modern international standards.

ABOUT.HEADING: About Us
ABOUT.HEADLINE: LLC Georgia Metal was founded in 2018 with the aim of building a modern high-tech factory that would fully supply the market with the amount of rebar sufficient to replace imports for the entire market.
ABOUT.TEXT: The company also has ambitions to actively participate on the international stage. The foundry workshop is currently operating in a hot testing mode. It is expected that by June 2025 the factory will enter full-scale production. After full-scale operation, its annual capacity will be 400 thousand tons of rebar. The founders have decided to expand the product range, and in the near future, construction will begin on an additional line for the production of clay, alongside a steel melting workshop with an 80-ton/hour electric arc furnace. LLC “Georgia Metal” is located in Zestafoni and currently employs over 300 people, most of whom are local residents. To achieve the best results, our team invited several foreign specialists with more than 30 years of experience in leading metallurgical factories in the CIS countries. The number of employees is expected to double by the time the steel melting workshop and additional clay production line are launched.

CAREER_SECTION.TITLE: Career
CAREER_SECTION.WHY_TEXT: Georgia Metal stands out with high-quality metal products, modern technologies, and qualified staff.
CAREER_SECTION.OPPORTUNITIES_TEXT: We offer career growth and professional development opportunities in the metallurgy field.
CAREER_SECTION.VACANCY_TEXT: Currently, there are no available vacancies. Please check back later or send us your resume.
